mapper.insert: insert into sjb_cart(productId, memberId, cartStock, addDate ) values(#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{cartStock}, sysdate());
mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, cartId, sjb_cart.productId, memberId, cartStock, addDate , title, authorID, (select authorName from sjb_author where sjb_book.authorID=sjb_author.authorID) as authorName, publisher, cateCode, (select cateName from sjb_bcate where sjb_book.cateCode=sjb_bcate.cateCode) as cateName, bookCover, publeYear, likeStar, bookReply, bookPrice, discountRate, bookInfo, contents, introImage,regdate,boardRegdate,modDate,bookStock from (select @rownum:=0) as rownum, sjb_cart join sjb_book on sjb_cart.productId = sjb_book.productID where sjb_cart.memberId = #{memberId};
mapper.delete: delete from sjb_cart where cartId = #{cartId} and memberId = #{memberId};
mapper.update: update sjb_cart set cartStock = #{cartStock} where cartId = #{cartId};
